name: Mugen SGF
short_description:
This is a 2d fight game. A Mugen clone tha has been built under the Salvathor Game Fabric.
We are far from 100% M.U.G.E.N. compatibility but we can run some mugen players...
When we had started this project, elecbyte was not active. and M.U.G.E.N. was without upgrades...
Elecbyte has returned to develpmento of M.U.G.E.N. and this project became no purpose. But if someone like to develop M.U.G.E.N. here there are a good start point...
summary: A Mugen clone that was build under salvathor Game fabric
